Class: ControlMessage

ControlMessage

A non-showing message placeholder that represents this user receiving the the control for a multivariate test. Can be passed to appboy.display.showInAppMessage to log the user's entrollment in the control or handled manually.

new ControlMessage(triggerId)

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
triggerId string <optional>

The id of the trigger that created this message. The SDK will report back this to Braze with in-app message analytics events.
